LoanApplicationLiability.name: LoanApplicationLiability
LoanApplicationLiability.description: Represents details about the borrower and co-borrower current liabilities.

AccountNumber.description: Borrower's account number with lender or creditor.

AccountType.description: Personal debt borrower owes like credit card balances, other debts, and leases.

CreditLimitAmount.description: Credit limit of real estate loan or line of credit.

CreditorName.description: Lender or creditor owed the debt.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LiabilityClass.description: Include the liability's monthly payment in this liability class monthly payment total.

LiabilityExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

LoanApplicationAssetId.description: ID of the loan application real estate asset associated with a real estate liability.

LoanApplicationId.description: ID of the loan application associated with this liability.

MonthlyPaymentAmount.description: Borrower's monthly payment required to keep debt account current.

Name.description: Name of the loan application liability.

OtherLiabilityType.description: Identifies type of other borrower expense or liability.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

ShouldBePaidInFull.description: Indicates whether borrower to pay off debt on or before closing.

UnpaidBalanceAmount.description: Unpaid liability balance when borrower completed loan application.
